casebody.data:
CAROLINA BLDG. SERVICES
v.
BOARDWALK. No. 444PA06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 15, 2007. L. Holmes Eleazer, Jr., Charlotte, Fenton T. Erwin, Jr., Lex M. Erwin, Jacksonville, for Carolina Building Services. Martin I. White, Charlotte, for Boardwalk. D. Christopher Osborn, Charlotte, for Home Owners.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of March 2007 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Boardwalk) shall have up to and including the 25th day of April 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 15th day of March 2007."
